Why choose our Basketball Scoreboard?

Our basketball scoreboard is a powerful, free online application designed specifically for basketball games. It's flexible, easy to use, and meets all your scoring needs.

Complete basketball features

Score tracking, game timer, shot clock, fouls, timeouts, and player statistics - everything you need for a professional basketball game.

Works offline

After loading once, the scoreboard works completely offline. Your game data is saved locally and syncs when you're back online.

Live streaming support

Built-in OBS overlay with transparent background. Perfect for streaming games on YouTube, Twitch, or any platform.

Multiple rule sets

Pre-configured rules for FIBA, NBA, NCAA, and 3x3 basketball. Or customize your own settings for any league.

The Free Basketball Scoreboard for Every Game

Perfect for Every Level of Play

Built for Live Streaming

Works Anywhere, Even Offline

Install this progressive web app on any device and use it without internet. Your game data saves locally and syncs when you're back online. Perfect for gyms with spotty WiFi or outdoor courts with no connection.

Track More Than Just the Score
